body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Glass and Nancy Glass. Married to Elizabeth Glass. Farmer in Johnson County, Indiana, in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Johnson County, Clark, p. 6; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 16; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 4.
